data.message: Seven thousand people with thoughts but no feelings. He has probably heard it all before, and hearing it again from another individual probably won't have an effect but for the first time listening to those lyrics, breaking em down and taken em into perspective, with that video.. "..." A perfect example to get what I'm saying would be "it hurts your brain trying to think about the origin of the meaning of life or why or how God made everything how it is." Took a heart of a saint to get through it, takes a heart of god to work back through it. More of a man then mankind.
